text: The burden [strongs id="h4853" /] of the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] to Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] by [strongs id="h3027" /] Malachi [strongs id="h4401" /].

I have loved [strongs id="h157" tvm="8804" /] you, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]. Yet ye say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], Wherein hast thou loved [strongs id="h157" tvm="8804" /] us? [Was] not Esau [strongs id="h6215" /] Jacob’s [strongs id="h3290" /] brother [strongs id="h251" /]? saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]: yet I loved [strongs id="h157" tvm="8799" /] Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /],

And I hated [strongs id="h8130" tvm="8804" /] Esau [strongs id="h6215" /], and laid [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8799" /] his mountains [strongs id="h2022" /] and his heritage [strongs id="h5159" /] waste [strongs id="h8077" /] for the dragons [strongs id="h8568" /] of the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /].

Whereas Edom [strongs id="h123" /] saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], We are impoverished [strongs id="h7567" tvm="8795" /], but we will return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /] and build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8799" /] the desolate places [strongs id="h2723" /]; thus saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], They shall build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8799" /], but I will throw down [strongs id="h2040" tvm="8799" /]; and they shall call [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8804" /] them, The border [strongs id="h1366" /] of wickedness [strongs id="h7564" /], and, The people [strongs id="h5971" /] against whom the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath indignation [strongs id="h2194" tvm="8804" /] for [strongs id="h5704" /] ever [strongs id="h5769" /].

And your eyes [strongs id="h5869" /] shall see [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8799" /], and ye shall say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] will be magnified [strongs id="h1431" tvm="8799" /] from the border [strongs id="h1366" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /].

A son [strongs id="h1121" /] honoureth [strongs id="h3513" tvm="8762" /] [his] father [strongs id="h1" /], and a servant [strongs id="h5650" /] his master [strongs id="h113" /]: if then I [be] a father [strongs id="h1" /], where [is] mine honour [strongs id="h3519" /]? and if I [be] a master [strongs id="h113" /], where [is] my fear [strongs id="h4172" /]? saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /] unto you, O priests [strongs id="h3548" /], that despise [strongs id="h959" tvm="8802" /] my name [strongs id="h8034" /]. And ye say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], Wherein have we despised [strongs id="h959" tvm="8804" /] thy name [strongs id="h8034" /]?

Ye offer [strongs id="h5066" tvm="8688" /] polluted [strongs id="h1351" tvm="8794" /] bread [strongs id="h3899" /] upon mine altar [strongs id="h4196" /]; and ye say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], Wherein have we polluted [strongs id="h1351" tvm="8765" /] thee? In that ye say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], The table [strongs id="h7979" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] contemptible [strongs id="h959" tvm="8737" /].

And if ye offer [strongs id="h5066" tvm="8686" /] the blind [strongs id="h5787" /] for sacrifice [strongs id="h2076" tvm="8800" /], [is it] not evil [strongs id="h7451" /]? and if ye offer [strongs id="h5066" tvm="8686" /] the lame [strongs id="h6455" /] and sick [strongs id="h2470" tvm="8802" /], [is it] not evil [strongs id="h7451" /]? offer [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8685" /] it now unto thy governor [strongs id="h6346" /]; will he be pleased [strongs id="h7521" tvm="8799" /] with thee, or accept [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] thy person [strongs id="h6440" /]? saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

And now, I pray you, beseech [strongs id="h2470" tvm="8761" /] [strongs id="h6440" /] God [strongs id="h410" /] that he will be gracious [strongs id="h2603" tvm="8799" /] unto us: this hath been by your means [strongs id="h3027" /]: will he regard [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] your persons [strongs id="h6440" /]? saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

Who [is there] even among you that would shut [strongs id="h5462" tvm="8799" /] the doors [strongs id="h1817" /] [for nought]? neither do ye kindle [strongs id="h215" tvm="8686" /] [fire] on mine altar [strongs id="h4196" /] for nought [strongs id="h2600" /]. I have no pleasure [strongs id="h2656" /] in you, saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], neither will I accept [strongs id="h7521" tvm="8799" /] an offering [strongs id="h4503" /] at your hand [strongs id="h3027" /].

For from the rising [strongs id="h4217" /] of the sun [strongs id="h8121" /] even unto the going down [strongs id="h3996" /] of the same my name [strongs id="h8034" /] [shall be] great [strongs id="h1419" /] among the Gentiles [strongs id="h1471" /]; and in every place [strongs id="h4725" /] incense [strongs id="h6999" tvm="8716" /] [shall be] offered [strongs id="h5066" tvm="8716" /] unto my name [strongs id="h8034" /], and a pure [strongs id="h2889" /] offering [strongs id="h4503" /]: for my name [strongs id="h8034" /] [shall be] great [strongs id="h1419" /] among the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

But ye have profaned [strongs id="h2490" tvm="8764" /] it, in that ye say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], The table [strongs id="h7979" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] polluted [strongs id="h1351" tvm="8794" /]; and the fruit [strongs id="h5108" /] thereof, [even] his meat [strongs id="h400" /], [is] contemptible [strongs id="h959" tvm="8737" /].

Ye said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] also, Behold, what a weariness [strongs id="h4972" /] [is it]! and ye have snuffed [strongs id="h5301" tvm="8689" /] at it, saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]; and ye brought [strongs id="h935" tvm="8689" /] [that which was] torn [strongs id="h1497" tvm="8803" /], and the lame [strongs id="h6455" /], and the sick [strongs id="h2470" tvm="8802" /]; thus ye brought [strongs id="h935" tvm="8689" /] an offering [strongs id="h4503" /]: should I accept [strongs id="h7521" tvm="8799" /] this of your hand [strongs id="h3027" /]? saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

But cursed [strongs id="h779" tvm="8803" /] [be] the deceiver [strongs id="h5230" tvm="8802" /], which [strongs id="h3426" /] hath in his flock [strongs id="h5739" /] a male [strongs id="h2145" /], and voweth [strongs id="h5087" tvm="8802" /], and sacrificeth [strongs id="h2076" tvm="8802" /] unto the Lord [strongs id="h136" /] a corrupt thing [strongs id="h7843" tvm="8716" /]: for I [am] a great [strongs id="h1419" /] King [strongs id="h4428" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], and my name [strongs id="h8034" /] [is] dreadful [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8737" /] among the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /].
And now, O ye priests [strongs id="h3548" /], this commandment [strongs id="h4687" /] [is] for you.

If ye will not hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8799" /], and if ye will not lay [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8799" /] [it] to heart [strongs id="h3820" /], to give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8800" /] glory [strongs id="h3519" /] unto my name [strongs id="h8034" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], I will even send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8765" /] a curse [strongs id="h3994" /] upon you, and I will curse [strongs id="h779" tvm="8804" /] your blessings [strongs id="h1293" /]: yea, I have cursed [strongs id="h779" tvm="8804" /] them already, because ye do not lay [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8802" /] [it] to heart [strongs id="h3820" /].

Behold, I will corrupt [strongs id="h1605" tvm="8802" /] your seed [strongs id="h2233" /], and spread [strongs id="h2219" tvm="8765" /] dung [strongs id="h6569" /] upon your faces [strongs id="h6440" /], [even] the dung [strongs id="h6569" /] of your solemn feasts [strongs id="h2282" /]; and [one] shall take you away [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8804" /] with it.

And ye shall know [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] that I have sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8765" /] this commandment [strongs id="h4687" /] unto you, that my covenant [strongs id="h1285" /] might be with Levi [strongs id="h3878" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

My covenant [strongs id="h1285" /] was with him of life [strongs id="h2416" /] and peace [strongs id="h7965" /]; and I gave [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] them to him [for] the fear [strongs id="h4172" /] wherewith he feared [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8799" /] me, and was afraid [strongs id="h2865" tvm="8738" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] my name [strongs id="h8034" /].

The law [strongs id="h8451" /] of truth [strongs id="h571" /] was in his mouth [strongs id="h6310" /], and iniquity [strongs id="h5766" /] was not found [strongs id="h4672" tvm="8738" /] in his lips [strongs id="h8193" /]: he walked [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /] with me in peace [strongs id="h7965" /] and equity [strongs id="h4334" /], and did turn [strongs id="h7725" /] many [strongs id="h7227" /] away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8689" /] from iniquity [strongs id="h5771" /].

For the priest’s [strongs id="h3548" /] lips [strongs id="h8193" /] should keep [strongs id="h8104" tvm="8799" /] knowledge [strongs id="h1847" /], and they should seek [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8762" /] the law [strongs id="h8451" /] at his mouth [strongs id="h6310" /]: for he [is] the messenger [strongs id="h4397" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

But ye are departed [strongs id="h5493" tvm="8804" /] out of the way [strongs id="h1870" /]; ye have caused many [strongs id="h7227" /] to stumble [strongs id="h3782" tvm="8689" /] at the law [strongs id="h8451" /]; ye have corrupted [strongs id="h7843" tvm="8765" /] the covenant [strongs id="h1285" /] of Levi [strongs id="h3878" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

Therefore have I also made [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] you contemptible [strongs id="h959" tvm="8737" /] and base [strongs id="h8217" /] before all the people [strongs id="h5971" /], according [strongs id="h6310" /] as ye have not kept [strongs id="h8104" tvm="8802" /] my ways [strongs id="h1870" /], but have been partial [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8802" /] [strongs id="h6440" /] in the law [strongs id="h8451" /].

Have we not all one [strongs id="h259" /] father [strongs id="h1" /]? hath not one [strongs id="h259" /] God [strongs id="h410" /] created [strongs id="h1254" tvm="8804" /] us? why do we deal treacherously [strongs id="h898" tvm="8799" /] every man [strongs id="h376" /] against his brother [strongs id="h251" /], by profaning [strongs id="h2490" tvm="8763" /] the covenant [strongs id="h1285" /] of our fathers [strongs id="h1" /]?

Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] hath dealt treacherously [strongs id="h898" tvm="8804" /], and an abomination [strongs id="h8441" /] is committed [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8738" /] in Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] and in Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /]; for Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] hath profaned [strongs id="h2490" tvm="8765" /] the holiness [strongs id="h6944" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] which he loved [strongs id="h157" tvm="8804" /], and hath married [strongs id="h1166" tvm="8804" /] the daughter [strongs id="h1323" /] of a strange [strongs id="h5236" /] god [strongs id="h410" /].

The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] will cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8686" /] the man [strongs id="h376" /] that doeth [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] this, the master [strongs id="h5782" tvm="8802" /] and the scholar [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8802" /], out of the tabernacles [strongs id="h168" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /], and him that offereth [strongs id="h5066" tvm="8688" /] an offering [strongs id="h4503" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

And this have ye done [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] again [strongs id="h8145" /], covering [strongs id="h3680" tvm="8763" /] the altar [strongs id="h4196" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] with tears [strongs id="h1832" /], with weeping [strongs id="h1065" /], and with crying out [strongs id="h603" /], insomuch that he regardeth [strongs id="h6437" tvm="8800" /] not the offering [strongs id="h4503" /] any more, or receiveth [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8800" /] [it] with good will [strongs id="h7522" /] at your hand [strongs id="h3027" /].

Yet ye say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], Wherefore [strongs id="h4100" /]? Because the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath been witness [strongs id="h5749" tvm="8689" /] between thee and the wife [strongs id="h802" /] of thy youth [strongs id="h5271" /], against whom thou hast dealt treacherously [strongs id="h898" tvm="8804" /]: yet [is] she thy companion [strongs id="h2278" /], and the wife [strongs id="h802" /] of thy covenant [strongs id="h1285" /].

And did not he make [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] one [strongs id="h259" /]? Yet had he the residue [strongs id="h7605" /] of the spirit [strongs id="h7307" /]. And wherefore one [strongs id="h259" /]? That he might seek [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8764" /] a godly [strongs id="h430" /] seed [strongs id="h2233" /]. Therefore take heed [strongs id="h8104" tvm="8738" /] to your spirit [strongs id="h7307" /], and let none deal treacherously [strongs id="h898" tvm="8799" /] against the wife [strongs id="h802" /] of his youth [strongs id="h5271" /].

For the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], the God [strongs id="h430" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] that he hateth [strongs id="h8130" tvm="8804" /] putting away [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8763" /]: for [one] covereth [strongs id="h3680" tvm="8765" /] violence [strongs id="h2555" /] with his garment [strongs id="h3830" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]: therefore take heed [strongs id="h8104" tvm="8738" /] to your spirit [strongs id="h7307" /], that ye deal not treacherously [strongs id="h898" tvm="8799" /].

Ye have wearied [strongs id="h3021" tvm="8689" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] with your words [strongs id="h1697" /]. Yet ye say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], Wherein have we wearied [strongs id="h3021" tvm="8689" /] [him]? When ye say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], Every one that doeth [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8802" /] evil [strongs id="h7451" /] [is] good [strongs id="h2896" /] in the sight [strongs id="h5869" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and he delighteth [strongs id="h2654" tvm="8804" /] in them; or, Where [is] the God [strongs id="h430" /] of judgment [strongs id="h4941" /]?

Behold, I will send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8802" /] my messenger [strongs id="h4397" /], and he shall prepare [strongs id="h6437" tvm="8765" /] the way [strongs id="h1870" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] me: and the Lord [strongs id="h113" /], whom ye seek [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8764" /], shall suddenly [strongs id="h6597" /] come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8799" /] to his temple [strongs id="h1964" /], even the messenger [strongs id="h4397" /] of the covenant [strongs id="h1285" /], whom ye delight [strongs id="h2655" /] in: behold, he shall come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8804" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

But who may abide [strongs id="h3557" tvm="8772" /] the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of his coming [strongs id="h935" tvm="8800" /]? and who shall stand [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8802" /] when he appeareth [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8736" /]? for he [is] like a refiner’s [strongs id="h6884" tvm="8764" /] fire [strongs id="h784" /], and like fullers [strongs id="h3526" tvm="8764" /]’ soap [strongs id="h1287" /]:

And he shall sit [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8804" /] [as] a refiner [strongs id="h6884" tvm="8764" /] and purifier [strongs id="h2891" tvm="8764" /] of silver [strongs id="h3701" /]: and he shall purify [strongs id="h2891" tvm="8765" /] the sons [strongs id="h1121" /] of Levi [strongs id="h3878" /], and purge [strongs id="h2212" tvm="8765" /] them as gold [strongs id="h2091" /] and silver [strongs id="h3701" /], that they may offer [strongs id="h5066" tvm="8688" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] an offering [strongs id="h4503" /] in righteousness [strongs id="h6666" /].

Then shall the offering [strongs id="h4503" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] and Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /] be pleasant [strongs id="h6149" tvm="8804" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], as in the days [strongs id="h3117" /] of old [strongs id="h5769" /], and as in former [strongs id="h6931" /] years [strongs id="h8141" /].

And I will come near [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8804" /] to you to judgment [strongs id="h4941" /]; and I will be a swift [strongs id="h4116" tvm="8764" /] witness [strongs id="h5707" /] against the sorcerers [strongs id="h3784" tvm="8764" /], and against the adulterers [strongs id="h5003" tvm="8764" /], and against false [strongs id="h8267" /] swearers [strongs id="h7650" tvm="8737" /], and against those that oppress [strongs id="h6231" tvm="8802" /] the hireling [strongs id="h7916" /] in [his] wages [strongs id="h7939" /], the widow [strongs id="h490" /], and the fatherless [strongs id="h3490" /], and that turn aside [strongs id="h5186" tvm="8688" /] the stranger [strongs id="h1616" /] [from his right], and fear [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8804" /] not me, saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

For I [am] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], I change [strongs id="h8138" tvm="8804" /] not; therefore ye sons [strongs id="h1121" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /] are not consumed [strongs id="h3615" tvm="8804" /].

Even from the days [strongs id="h3117" /] of your fathers [strongs id="h1" /] ye are gone away [strongs id="h5493" tvm="8804" /] from mine ordinances [strongs id="h2706" /], and have not kept [strongs id="h8104" tvm="8804" /] [them]. Return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8798" /] unto me, and I will return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /] unto you, saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]. But ye said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], Wherein shall we return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /]?

Will a man [strongs id="h120" /] rob [strongs id="h6906" tvm="8799" /] God [strongs id="h430" /]? Yet ye have robbed [strongs id="h6906" tvm="8802" /] me. But ye say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], Wherein have we robbed [strongs id="h6906" tvm="8804" /] thee? In tithes [strongs id="h4643" /] and offerings [strongs id="h8641" /].
Ye [are] cursed [strongs id="h779" tvm="8737" /] with a curse [strongs id="h3994" /]: for ye have robbed [strongs id="h6906" tvm="8802" /] me, [even] this whole nation [strongs id="h1471" /].

Bring [strongs id="h935" tvm="8685" /] ye all the tithes [strongs id="h4643" /] into the storehouse [strongs id="h214" /], that there may be meat [strongs id="h2964" /] in mine house [strongs id="h1004" /], and prove [strongs id="h974" tvm="8798" /] me now herewith [strongs id="h2063" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], if I will not open [strongs id="h6605" tvm="8799" /] you the windows [strongs id="h699" /] of heaven [strongs id="h8064" /], and pour you out [strongs id="h7324" tvm="8689" /] a blessing [strongs id="h1293" /], that [there shall] not [be room] enough [strongs id="h1767" /] [to receive it].
